TopicTitle: Your avatar is stuck in an elevator with the above poster's avatar, what do you do?

Articles.Content:
Better than Grabbing hooves though. Did you know most Hooves in FiM made of Cartilage instead of Keretin/whatever the heck they are made of in Real life? We can bend the area where the Thumb may be to hold things like cutlery and Pencils.

Fact over.
There's also fur on the unicorn horn (and on hooves)...

Eh, still. There are worse things to grab, like claws or scales. Very sharp.

Damn, ninja'd
The equine morphology is wierd, indeed.

Ok. How many of you would come and see my thread if i told you what i will do. Its what i call a antintelectual documentary. Basicly ima go watch MLP and say how much i hate/like(pppppfffff...) it. I want to know how many people would look at it.
Where'd he come from? If I watched it, I'd break the fourth wall.
I dont understand. And why are you hating at me in other fourms?
(What am I doing? Blah, yeah, sorry.)
Eh its fine. Oh BTW where is Maskeviya? Cant find in on google maps.

Hah, that's because It's my made up nation you silly corgi!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V0gmE0H_rW0
Oh i thought it was real
*facepalm*
that was my point.
Finished first MLP episode. God i have a headache for no reason and im off to a bad start.

The intro alway make me feel guiltly.

P.S. you are doomed :3
How am i doomed. I have a headache after 3 episodes.

Go drink a glass of water, you must be dehydrated.

You don't need to watch all the frist season in one day

Yes, we're all "deshydrated".

So true

I am now angry at mrpample cause i watched trf music video. God...........

You should have only listened the music alone.

P.S. Im that psycho, I never trought that TRF music video was that disturbing.

Well should have told me before hand shouldnt we?

got to listen to 10 hours of sweet brown to erase this memory.
so how's that marrathon working out for you

It worked out well. My heads clear and now its full of hatred at mrpample.

And wow mrpample you are a psycho
And you just figured this out?
remember he's new... but yea ... he is... kind of like fluttershy...
